title: Deploy/publish the website now
constraints: Use the existing platform-managed deployment slug exactly as configured: "blackrays-car-rentals-tours" (see frontend/src/config/deployment.ts).
Do not use the invalid slug "blackrays-car-rentals-&-tours-and-travels" (contains an invalid character).
Keep SPA routing fallback intact (frontend/public/_redirects should continue routing all paths to /index.html).
nonGoals: Adding new pages/features/content unrelated to deployment.
Changing branding, theme, or contact details as part of this request.
